summary:
Heathcliff is a companion with new class, new combat style, standalone weapon & shield, standalone appearance, and standalone armors and many more. He can teach you his blocking skills and give you tips about fighting.

If you have watched Sword Art Online anime, then I\'m sure you know him. ^___^
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/A.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/A.png[/IMG][/URL]
Heathcliff is a companion with new class, new combat style, standalone weapon & shield, standalone appearance, and standalone armors and many more. He can teach you his blocking skills and give you tips about fighting.

If you have watched [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sword_Art_Online][i]Sword Art Online[/i][/url] anime, then I\'m sure you know him. ^___^


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/B.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/B.png[/IMG][/URL]
[url=http://swordartonline.wikia.com/wiki/Heathcliff]Heathcliff[/url] is the leader of what is considered to be the strongest guild on skyrim [url=http://swordartonline.wikia.com/wiki/Knights_of_the_Blood]\"Knights of the Blood\"[/url]. He wields the one-handed sword and a tower shield collectively called as Liberator. As a leader of the Knight of the Blood, Heathcliff was quite renown for his general tendency to stay out of guild affairs, preferring to allow his sub-leaders to develop plans and advance the jobs. Apart from guild paperwork and battles, Heathcliff rarely interfered with the choices and actions of his sub-leaders.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/C.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/C.png[/IMG][/URL]
[list]
[*]He is a fighter with one-handed weapon and blocking skills;
[*]He is marriagable;
[*]He is [i]essential[/i], it means he cannot die on any circumstances;
[*]He doesn\'t trigger trap;
[*]He doesn\'t affect stealth meter;
[*]He doesn\'t care with your crime;
[*]His min level is 15 and his max level is 100 with level mult at 1.20 .
[/list]

Here\'s an overview of his features that differs him from other companion:
[list]
[*][b]Standalone equipment[/b], he is using an equipment set of \"Knight of the Blood\";
[*][b]Standalone appearance[/b], he will use his own meshes & textures no matter what meshes & textures you used;
[*][b]New class[/b], he is classified as \"Knight of the Blood\" at the game;
[*][b]New combat style[/b], he is using new combat styles that makes him fight different from other companion and enemy. I recommend you to use a mod called [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22650]Enhanced Skyrim Factions: Companions[/url] and ask Heathcliff to sparring with you in order to see his new combat style;
[*][b]Tweaked dialogue[/b], his current voice is MaleEvenToned. But, his voice is tweaked so he will not speak the same as normal companion;
[*][b]New quest[/b], you must complete a quest for him first before you can recruit him as your companion. This quest is fully-voiced using all vanilla assets;
[*][b]New dialogue[/b], you can ask him to give a tips about fighting after you complete his quest. This dialogue is fully-voiced using all vanilla assets;
[*][b]Block trainer[/b], you can ask him to train you at blocking skills after you complete his quest. He is a master trainer, it means that he can train you until your blocking skills is 100.
[*][b]Daily Schedule[/b], he has his own schedule during a week. Here\'s his schedule for a week:
1. He has a breakfast at Jorrvaskr from 10.00 to 13.00 during weekdays
2. He will training on Jorrvaskr\'s training yard from 13.00 to 18.00 during weekdays 
3. He has a dinner at Jorrvaskr from 19.00 to 22.00 during weekdays
4. He is on Temple of Kynareth all day long during weekends
5. He has a dinner on Dragonsreach on Sunday night
6. He sleeps at Jorrvaskr Barracks from 22.00 to 08.00
7. He will hang out in Jorrvaskr when not doing any activities listed above[/list]


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/D.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/D.png[/IMG][/URL]
He is located in Whiterun. See above at his daily schedule for exact location.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/E.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/E.png[/IMG][/URL]
No mod(s) are required to use this mod. All files required are already on the archive.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/F.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/F.png[/IMG][/URL]
Manual installation:
Unpack the archive into your Skyrim\\Data directory and activate the mod in the Data Files section of the Skyrim launcher.

Nexus Mod Manager Installation:
Just activate this mod on NMM.

Manual Uninstallation:
Delete the following files/folders from your Skyrim Data directory:
  Heathcliff.esp
  Heathcliff.bsa

Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation:
Just deactivate this mod on NMM.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/G.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/G.png[/IMG][/URL]
Put this mod above all mods that alter follower system (UFO, AFT, EFF, etc.)


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/H.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/H.png[/IMG][/URL]
[list][*]You can collect the golds that you\'ve paid to Heathcliff after asked him to train you. This bug can be exploited to get infinite training from him.[/list]It\'s up to you whether you want to exploit this bug or not.

Let me know if you find another one.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/I.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/I.png[/IMG][/URL]
List of mods that compatible with this mod:
[list][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]AFT[/url] (Tested by me)
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22650]ESF Companions[/url] (Tested by me)[/list]

List of mods that incompatible with this mod:
[list][*]None that I\'m aware of.[/list]
If you find a compatibility or an incompatibility please let me know so I can write it here. 


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/J.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/J.png[/IMG][/URL]
[list]
[*]Custom-voiced Heathcliff;
[*]Adjustable equipment via in-game dialogue;
[*]More Quest.
[/list]


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/K.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/K.png[/IMG][/URL]
[list]
[*]Where is he?
See above for his daily schedule location.
[/list]
[list][*]Can I use it with [b]UFO[/b] or [b]EFF[/b]?
I can\'t see any reason why UFO and EFF  are incompatible with this mod. But I haven\'t tested this mod with both mods, so if you use UFO or EFF please let me know how this mod works.
[/list]
[list][*]Should I clean the esp file?
No, you shouldn\'t. It is because the esp file on this mod was already clean.
[/list]


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/L.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/L.png[/IMG][/URL]
Bethesda for Skyrim
ASCII Media Works & A-1 Pictures for Sword Art Online
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/114172]Chris57[/url] for Heathcliff\'s body and face
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/726673]Xenius[/url]for Heathcliff\'s lips
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]Apachii[/url] for Heathcliff\'s hair
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/527930]Mancika[/url] for Heathcliff\'s armor, cloak, sword and shield
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/103363]Jerros[/url] for Heathcliff\'s armor
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3656551]Hothtrooper44[/url] for Heathcliff\'s armor
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/383710]Nikinoodles[/url] for Heathcliff\'s cloak
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5755326]SkyrimTuner[/url] for the ENB used


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/M.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/M.png[/IMG][/URL]
[list]

[*][url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url] 

[*][url=http://www.adobe.com/america/products/photoshop.html?kw=p&sdid=JTAJR&skwcid=TC|22636|photoshop||S|b|26174987875]Photoshop[/url] 

[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url] 

[*][url=http://www.winrar.com]WinRAR[/url]

[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on the steam network.

[/list] 


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/N.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/N.png[/IMG][/URL]
Before you use the content, first contact me and ask for permission. It\'s because some files on this mod were created by other authors.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/O.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/O.png[/IMG][/URL]
You may contact me on this account.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/P.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/P.png[/IMG][/URL]
Please be aware that this is my very first mod for skyrim. However, I\'ve made this mod as clean as possible to minimize the bugs it may contain.
I\'ve uploaded a sample voice of Heathcliff from the [i]Sword Art Online[/i] anime. Please PM me if you interested to do a voice-acting and your voice match the sample.
English is not my native language. So, I\'m sorry for all spelling and grammar on this mod and description if it was wrong. Please tell me what should be corrected and I\'ll see what I can do.


[URL=http://s1237.photobucket.com/user/Mr777Nick/media/Q.png.html][IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff479/Mr777Nick/Q.png[/IMG][/URL]
Version 1.0 : Initial Release
author: Mr777Nick
